column4: is there anyway to have a terminal window embedded into my desktop?
theres some tricks to do that. Or thers some Hit F12 and have one popdown tools also.
tell the channel your video card for starters and how its connected to the monitor.
ATI Radeon 4850 HD
i find that janotor tool to be the kind of thing that should of not been included
it most likely removed your fglrx drivers - you could rerun the 'hardware drivers' tool and it may want to reinstall them
ya I know I thought it was gonna get rid of unused packages but boy was I wrong
it removes unofficial packages I think. :)  ive never really messed withit once i saw what it was wanting to remove
well I didn't use hardware drivers tool instead I installed them manually from drivers @ ati.com
the ones in hardware drivers didn't work for me
it wants to remove opera and a few other  not in the normal repos packages here..
i would reinstall them from ati.com - if there was a kernel upgrade THAT would rewuire you to reinstall them from ati.com each time the kernel updates
ok I'll do a reinstall of them thanks
that will be needed EACH time theres a kernel update.. most likely.. somthing to rember
ok thanks
windows wants a cr and lf at the end of each line.. linux/unix only needs one.. theres some text2dos or similer commands that can 'fix' it..
may be dos2unix or unix2dos commands.. been ages since ive had to mess withit.
for windows or ubuntu?
yes.. :)  i imgine its been ported to windows some how.. and its in linux.
theres prob. a dozen tools to convert the things.
well i just need one ;P
so you need to decide what os you want to do the converting in...
